import React from 'react' import '../styles/tour-details.css' import {container,Row,Col,Form,ListGroup} from 'reactstrap' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' const TourDetails = () => { const {id} = userParams() const tour = tourData.find(tour=> tour.id===id) const {photo, title,desc,price,reviews,city,distance,maxGroupSize} = tour return ( <>

{title}

 ) } export default TourDetails
